mean_cn: adj. 弯弯曲曲的，蜿蜒的
mean_en: not simple and direct; long, complicated and difficult to understand; (of a road, path, etc.) full of bends
sentence: To reach the cottage we have to take a tortuous route through the mountains.
sentence_trans: 去那个小村子我们得通过弯弯曲曲的盘山公路。
word_etyma: tort扭转 + uous……的 → tortuous弯曲的
